channel.title: Manasi Jayakumar, M.Phil. on Manasi Jayakumar
channel.description: Recent content in Manasi Jayakumar, M.Phil. on Manasi Jayakumar

item.title: Research
item.description: My current research focuses on how naturalistic fluctuations in attention can be characterized and how these fluctuations in attention influence the temporal organization of memory. Publications Jayakumar, M., Balusu, C., Aly, M. (2023). Attentional fluctuations and the temporal organization of memory. Cognition, 235, 105408. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.cognition.2023.105408. [PDF]. [PsyArXiv]. [OSF]. [self-contained Code Ocean computing enviornment]. Trelle, A. N., Carr, V. A., Wilson, E. N., Swarovski, M. S., Hunt, M. P., Toueg, T.
